titleStmt.title: The restitution of King Nabuchadnezzer Dan. 4. Verses. 31. 32. 33. 34. By Henrie Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Scarlet [and are to be sold by William Wright],

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The restitution of Nabuchadnezzer.

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
